title: get_supply_summary
description: Test the GET /api/economy/supply endpoint to verify it returns the correct supply summary with status 200.

title: list_supply_transactions_with_limit
description: Test the GET /api/economy/supply/txs endpoint with a limit query parameter to ensure it returns a paginated list of supply transactions.

title: supply_sse_stream_connection
description: Test the GET /api/economy/supply/stream endpoint to verify it establishes a Server-Sent Events (SSE) stream and sends supply updates correctly.

title: list_users_with_fires_pagination_and_search
description: Test the GET /api/economy/users endpoint with cursor, limit, and search query parameters to verify it returns a filtered and paginated list of users with fires.

title: get_user_fires_history_with_pagination
description: Test the GET /api/economy/history/{userId} endpoint with limit and offset query parameters to ensure it returns the correct paginated history of fires transactions for the specified user.

title: list_sponsors
description: Test the GET /api/economy/sponsors endpoint to verify it returns the list of sponsors with status 200.

title: add_sponsor_with_valid_data
description: Test the POST /api/economy/sponsors/add endpoint with valid sponsor data and admin authorization to verify a sponsor is added successfully.

title: remove_sponsor_with_valid_userid
description: Test the POST /api/economy/sponsors/remove endpoint with a valid userId and admin authorization to verify the sponsor is removed successfully.

title: transfer_fires_between_users
description: Test the POST /api/economy/transfer endpoint with valid fromUserId, toUserId, amount, and optional sponsorKey to verify fires are transferred correctly and transaction is recorded.

title: redeem_item_from_store
description: Test the POST /api/store/redeem endpoint with valid userId and itemId to verify the item redemption process using fires works correctly and returns status 200.
